title: Will karma ever get another skin
body: I really enjoy playing karma and was just wondering if she will ever get a new skin?

replies.body:
Yup! 

Actually, Warden Karma is heading to PBE right now! :D

OMG YES! I saw the photos and it looks amazing. I hope the splash art is beautiful.

Too bad I spent all my rp (that I specifically saved for a Karma skin) on Project: Fiora. Should have waited a few days more ._.

The kindred skin also looks awesome. I think my wallet is going to die.
isn't her head a bit big?
maybe a little it seems, the mask reminds me of predator from the alien universe
PROJECT Karma would have been so fancy. Those textures with her Mantra would have looked great...Riot pls
